dimod.responses.SpinResponse.relabel_samples¶

SpinResponse.relabel_samples(mapping, copy=True)¶

Relabels the variable in the samples.

Parameters:
  • mapping (dict) – A dictionary with the old labels as keys and the new labels as values. A partial mapping is allowed.
  • copy (optional) – If True, return a copy or if False relabel the samples in place.

Examples

>>> response = TemplateResponse()
>>> response.add_sample({'a': -1, 'b': 1}, 1)
>>> response.add_sample({'a': 1, 'b': -1}, -1)
>>> mapping = {'a': 1, 'b': 0}

>>> new_response = response.relabel_samples(mapping)
>>> list(new_response.samples())
[{0: -1, 1: 1}, {0: 1, 1: -1}]

>>> response.relabel_samples(mapping, copy=False)
>>> list(response.samples())
[{0: -1, 1: 1}, {0: 1, 1: -1}]
